title: Luxury House For Sale In Moratuwa
details:
LUXURY HOUSE FOR SALE

13.5 perch luxury house for sale in Katubedda, Moratuwa

PROPERTY FEATURES
3 bed rooms
2 toilets
sitting area A/C (down stairs)
dinning area
Open Plan Kitchen
Indoor pool
Store room
Out door garden
Roof top entertainment area/ room
servants quarters
servants toilet
parking for 4 vehicles with roller gates

few finishing touch ups to be done
Price LRK 27 Million
P.S : Property can be seen only on prior appointment
cal Raj 0774437373 for further details
